definition: to throw away one's life
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
to be looked after in life and given a proper burial thereafter (idiom)

sentences.english: They lie and cheat and send young Americans to their death solely for their own profit.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲了自己的利益扯謊作弊，讓美國年輕人去送死。

sentences.english: I don't want Adai to die, too.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望阿岱也來送死。

sentences.english: So these are the new corpses, huh?
sentences.chinese: 那麼這些就是新來送死的了，哈？

sentences.english: I'll laugh last cause you came to die.
sentences.chinese: 我會一直大笑，因爲你們都是來送死的。

sentences.english: "Buthe killed millions and yet people still buy it?" I ask.
sentences.chinese: 但是他讓數百萬人送死，人們還是會買？

sentences.english: I don't want Adai to die,too.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望阿岱也來送死。

definition: to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to court death/taking risks
to lose one's life/to get killed
lit. to strike a stone with egg (idiom); to attempt the impossible/to invite disaster by overreaching oneself
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
to walk right into the trap
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
afraid to die (contemptuous term)
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
to escape/to flee/to run for one's life
cannon fodder
blockhead/idiot/dunce/moron/fool
fight to the death/desperate struggle
to notify/to inform
stupid young fellow/idiot
